common.guest_cta: Hwehwɛ MedLink AI a w’ankɔ mu

splash.tagline: Wo yare ho ɔkasafoɔ a wotumi de wɔn di dwuma
splash.subtitle: Kɔ ne dɔkotani nkyɛn, hwɛ wo aduro ho nsɛm, na fa wo yare ho tumi wɔ wo nsam

onboarding.hero_title:
Ayareyɛ ntetee ma Ghana.
Yenim sɛnea edi mu.
onboarding.hero_subtitle: Bisa dɔkotani a wowɔ Ghana ha wɔ MedLink dan nyinaa mu.
onboarding.page_connect_body: Fa fon no so nya dɔkotani a wohu no pa ara wɔ video anaa kasakoa bere biara.
onboarding.page_rx_body: Nya aduro krataa ntɛm ara na hu pharmacy a wɔwɔ aduro no de ma wo.
onboarding.page_lab_body: Tow lab krataa braha na kyekyɛ ma dɔkotani a ofii ho, na hwɛ wo nsakrae mu kɔ.
onboarding.page_personal_body: Fa Twi anaa Borɔfo, nya AI mmoa, na tena so hwɛ wo nkitahodie nyinaa mu.

login.subtitle: Kɔ mu na toa wo ayaresa kwan no so wɔ Twi anaa Borɔfo mu.
login.identifier_hint: Kyerɛ wo email anaa fon nɔma
login.identifier_required: Yɛ pɛ sɛ wokyerɛ wo email anaa fon nɔma
login.password_required: Yɛ pɛ sɛ wokyerɛ wo password
login.guest: Toa so sɛ obi a wɔnnyɛ obi
login.error_missing_credentials: Hyɛ wo email anaa fon nɔma

ai.intake_subtitle: Ka “MedLink” na mic no nnyegye, na bɔ wo yare ho amanneɛ wɔ Twi anaa Borɔfo mu.
ai.status_unavailable_hint: Ma fon no kwan ma app no tumi yɛ mic ho adwuma.
ai.status_listening_hint: Ka “MedLink” mu yiye na MedLink AI ativete nkae no.
ai.status_recording_hint: Ka wo yare ho asɛm wɔ Twi anaa Borɔfo mu. Gyae bere a wowie.
ai.status_ready: Fa wo nsateaa gu mic no so na hyɛ ase
ai.status_ready_hint: MedLink AI bɛkyere na abɔ dɔkotani pa a ɔde bɛboa wo.
ai.transcript_placeholder: Nwoma a wokae wɔ Twi/Borɔfo mu bɛda ha kɔkɔɔkɔ.
ai.analyze: Hwɛ na fa me kɔ dɔkotani pa ho
ai.recommendations_title: Dokotani a yɛpɛ sɛ wokɔ wɔn nkyɛn
ai.hero_subtitle: AI no bɛma woanya dɔkotani pa a ɔwɔ hɔ seesei.
ai.chip_tap: Fa wo nsateaa gu mic no so

connecting.title: Yɛrehyehyɛ dɔkotani pa ama wo
connecting.subtitle: Yɛrebɔ wo nsɛm ho adwuma na yɛrehwehwɛ ɔbenfo a ɔde bɛboa wo.

body_selector.title: Paw nipadua mmea
body_selector.subtitle: Dan nipadua no mu na hu nkyɛn nyinaa, na paw mmea a ɛyɛ wo ya nyinaa
body_selector.instructions: Dan, kɛse, na fa 3D model no mu. Fa wo nsateaa gu mmea a ɛwɔ ase no so na paw nipadua mmea pii.
body_selector.select_parts: Paw mmea a ɛyɛ wo ya
body_selector.select_hint: Dan 3D model no mu na paw nipadua mmea a ɛyɛ wo ya nyinaa
body_selector.select_part_hint: Yɛ pɛ sɛ wopaw nipadua fa biara pɛ na toa so

settings.title: Nhyehyɛe
settings.ai_shortcut_subtitle: Kɔ MedLink AI mu na kɔkasa fa wo haw ne mpɔtam adɔkotani ho.

language.switch_hint: Wubetumi asesa wɔ Twi anaa Borɔfo bere biara.
language.option_en_desc: Toa MedLink akwantuo no so wɔ Borɔfo mu.
language.option_tw_desc: Fa MedLink mu biribiara wɔ Twi kasa mu.

register.title: Bɔ akawnt
register.role_subtitle: Paw wo dwumadie ansa na yɛato mu
register.role_doctor_desc: Ma ayaresa na hwɛ wo adwumadwuma so
register.role_validation: Paw dwumadie ansa na woto mu
register.first_name_hint: Hyɛ wo din a edi kan
register.first_name_error: Hyɛ wo din a edi kan
register.step_password_subtitle: Paw ehintasɛmfua den na kora wo akawnt
register.password_requirement_length: Ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ nson anaa kɔ soro
register.password_requirement_mix: Ka nsɛmfua ne mfema bɔ mu
register.dob_hint: Pia ha na paw wo awoɔ da

home.welcome_subtitle: Dɛn na yɛmfa boa wo nnɛ?
home.how_can_we_help: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ yɛyɛ ama wo?
home.ai_intake_subtitle: Bɔ wo haw ho amanneɛ na nya dɔkotani kɔkɔɔkɔ
home.find_care_subtitle: Hwɛ pharmacy, ayaresabea ne lab wɔ mapa so
home.map_care_subtitle: Hwɛ MedLink dan ne som mpɔtam so
home.doctor_queue_subtitle: Hwɛ na frɛ nnipa a wɔretwɛn
home.doctor_manage_subtitle: Bue nkɔmmɔbɔ, kyerɛ nsɛm, bɔ nhyehyɛe
home.health_tip_content: Nom nsuo pii, sɛe wo ho, na didi pa ma nipasu mu asetra.

location.error: Yentumi nhu wo beae. Ma GPS so na san sɔ hwɛ.

pharmacy.prescription_sent: Yɛde prescription no akɔ pharmacy no.

doctor.no_results: Yenhuu dɔkotani a ɛtɔ wo no
doctor.no_doctors_subtitle: Dɔkotani bɛda ha bere a wobɛtɔ mu wɔ MedLink so.
doctor.try_different_search: Sesa wo nsɛmmisa anaa fa nhyehyɛe foforo
doctor.available_today: Wɔbɛtumi ne wo adi dwuma nnɛ
doctor.load_error: Yentumi ankyerɛ dɔkotani no. San sɔ hwɛ bio.

payment.title: Tua sika no

method.title: Fa no so tua
method.mobile_money.desc: Tua ka wo MTN, Vodafone anaa AirtelTigo Money so
method.card.desc: Kaad tua ka a Paystack bɔ ho ban

payment.error: Entumi antua ka no. San sɔ hwɛ.

queue.title: Atwene mu
queue.ready_message: Dɔkotani no yɛ set wɔ wo ho no.

leave.label: Fi atwene mu
leave.title: Wopɛ sɛ wufi atwene mu?
leave.message: Sɛ wufi atwene mu a, wɔbɛtwa saa nkitahodie no so. Wopɛ sɛ wufi mu anaa?
